thread.title: Get a First Look at the New HBO Documentary "The Latin Explosion"
thread.title_full: Get a First Look at the New HBO Documentary "The Latin Explosion"

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Get a First Look at the New HBO Documentary "The Latin Explosion"
text:
The trailer for upcoming Tommy Mottola-produced HBO documentary, The Latin Explosion: A New America is here, and it features interviews with seemingly every A-list Latino celebrity alive today, including Gloria Estefan, Thalia, Romeo Santos, J.Lo, Marc Anthony, Ricky Martin, and Eva Longoria.
Although the documentary focuses on entertainment, it also examines the long history Latinos have in the U.S. and the roles they've played in politics — and the uphill battle for acceptance in the mainstream U.S.
 The Latin Explosion airs Nov. 16 at 9 p.m. on HBO and HBO Latino. ​
Follow Alanna on Twitter .
